rows.label: bf09130100_0010
rows.name:
Your Holiness, the foes
have been sighted.

rows.label: bf09130100_0020
rows.name:
So it's the lost technology of Iira
How fascinating to witness it.

rows.label: bf09130100_0030
rows.name:
Surprised, eh? There are still
a few of us hanging on.

rows.label: bf09130100_0050
rows.name:
Just like that man... You survived
by becoming a Man-Eater.

rows.label: bf09130100_0090
rows.name:
Sorry to disappoint you.
That won't work on me.

rows.label: bf09130100_0100
rows.name: After all, I am the same as you.

rows.label: bf09130100_0140
rows.name:
The Blade-Eater technology is
only possessed by [System:Ruby rt=Acedia ]Holy See[/System:Ruby]...

rows.label: bf09130100_0160
rows.name: But you weren't the only one.

rows.label: bf09130100_0170
rows.name:
What did you do before implanting
that Core Crystal into yourself?
